name: Salomon OUTbound Prism Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes - Women's
categories: OUTbound Prism Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes
description:
Modern style with outdoor performance, the Outbound Prism shoe easily transitions from daily life to outdoor pursuits. Lightweight, foot-hugging upper offers sneaker-like comfort and the GORE-TEX® membrane protects you in light showers or damp trail conditions.Seamless anti-debris mesh uppers are lightweight and durable.Waterproof-breathable GORE-TEX booties let you tackle wet conditions.Discrete toecap adds toe protection.Wicking S.Café® sockliner is made from coffee grounds.EnergyCell EVA midsoles absorb trail shocks for comfort over long distances.Non-marking Contagrip® MA is highly durable and grippy.5mm lugs provide traction over a variety of directions and surfaces.

        Sustainability
